turkish_example_sentence: Sen yeşil elmaları alsan, sağlıklı bir kahvaltı yapabilirsin.
english_example_sentence: If you were to take the green apples, you could make a healthy breakfast.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты взял зеленые яблоки, ты мог бы приготовить здоровый завтрак.
